item.title: FIRST CTF for ASEAN
item.author: sondt
item.description: Miscellaneous Miscellaneous challenges AWS limited (36 solves) Description We have secured our files, since they were stolen last time. Apparently we opened the S3 bucket and it was world readable. We fould a simple way, within AWS, to restrict it so only authenticated people can gain access to the files, this should keep everyone not in AWS, out… https://first-ctf-challenge-2023.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/flag.txt Challenges for BlockChain technology (1/5) (153 solves) Description A healthcare institution implemented a blockchain-based system for storing patient medical records to ensure integrity of medical data.
